items.sentence: Tom says that recently he isn\'t able to get enough sleep.
Recently, Tom has been hanging out with Mary all the time.
I can\'t seem to do anything that doesn\'t make Tom angry.
Tom told me that he needed to get something off his chest.
I check off each task on my list as soon as I complete it.
I know a lot of people who don\'t have driver\'s licenses.
The books that I bought were delivered to me this morning.
The cookies Tom baked this afternoon are really delicious.
The detective promised to look into the matter right away.
Are you sure you don\'t want me to talk to Tom about that?
